When Thriving Grubs enters, you get {E}{E}.
Whenever Thriving Grubs attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

Whenever a permanent you control manufactures you may pay 2 life. If you do, instead of choosing one, you both add counters and make servos.
